attributes.action: Jeremy Clarkson's comments on public sector strikers were a 'joke'
attributes.additional_details: Jeremy Clarkson saying something a little bit offensive should not motivate the leader of Her Majesty's Opposition to describe him as 'disgraceful and disgusting'. Jokes are jokes, whether they are offensive or not; politicians should stop going around instructing people to issue apologies, especially when they themselves refuse to apologise for being part an administration that, through its financial incompetence and incontinence, has lead directly to the economic catastrophe we now face.
